        public static double scale​(double n,
                           double x1,
                           double x2,
                           double y1,
                           double y2)
        Scale a number in the range of x1 to x2, to the range of y1 to y2
        Parameters:
        n - number to scale
        x1 - lower bound range of n
        x2 - upper bound range of n
        y1 - lower bound of scale
        y2 - upper bound of scale
        Returns:
        a double scaled to a value between y1 and y2, inclusive

      • circleLineIntersection

        public static Point circleLineIntersection​(Point center,
                                           Point startPoint,
                                           Point endPoint,
                                           double radius)
        Returns the closest intersection point to the end of a line segment created through the intersection of a line and circle. The main purpose of this is for pure pursuit but I'll prob implement it into our goToPosition algorithm. For pure pursuit use, c would be the clipped robot point, startPoint would be the current segment start point, endPoint would be the current segment end point, and radius would be our follow distance
        Parameters:
        center - center point of circle
        startPoint - start point of the line segment
        endPoint - end point of the line segment
        radius - radius of the circle
        Returns:
        intersection point closest to endPoint
        See Also:
        https://mathworld.wolfram.com/Circle-LineIntersection.html
